## Protocol.Network.CookieSameSite type

Represents the cookie's 'SameSite' status: https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type CookieSameSite = ('Strict' | 'Lax' | 'None');
```
